attributes.action: bring back national service, discipline in schools, and give the bobby on beat rights to discipline unruly kids
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i remember when the bobby on the beat clipped you round the ear for being lippy, the head teacher and fellow teachers was treated with respect, nowadays the kids put two fingers up at all authority as we are turning into a nanny state. lets change it now.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
